comments:
Using WTP1.5.2 20061021

1. Create a new/blank jspf
2. JSP Fragment properties, set content type to "text/xml"
3. open blank jspf file and prompt for content assist
4. Get the following exception (full .log attached):
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-10-25 03:50:53.253
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.html.ui.internal.contentassist.HTMLContentAssistProcessor.getHTMLTagPropsosal(HTMLContentAssistProcessor.java:339)
	at org.eclipse.wst.html.ui.internal.contentassist.HTMLContentAssistProcessor.computeCompletionProposals(HTMLContentAssistProcessor.java:214)
	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.ui.internal.contentassist.JSPContentAssistProcessor.computeCompletionProposals(JSPContentAssistProcessor.java:839)
